FORBEAR Nor COMMUNJON. 133

Often this hinders men— Excessive care to get a holy frame of mind, And an anxiety about confession. Do as the wise would have you do, Lay scruple and anxiety aside. It stops the hand* of God, It ruins holy thoughts.

You are disturbed or slightly troubled— Leave not your communion for that,

But go the sooner to confess; And from your heart

Forgive all others their offences. But if you have hurt anyoie, Humbly ask forgiveness,

And God will fully pardon you.
